changes.change: Fixed freezes when opening Control Center with "Always White" style on iOS 11
Forces background to be displayed when background style bar is selected
Now uses color instead of blur for the background (if you want to use blur again you can modify the plist file and add isBlurBackgroundEnabled)
Added ability to modify white and black background grayness which is used for the background color by modifying the plist file and adding WhiteBackgroundGrayness or BlackBackgroundGrayness
